pullRequest.body:
The need for this class has shown up in PFR: when conditioning on a set, one gets a measure which is either zero or a probability measure, and many results that hold for probability measures also hold trivially for the zero measure.

---

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

### PR summary [77e97e90a9](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16130/commits/77e97e90a95985382edb26f7ac2c7404aadd7831)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ IsZeroOrProbabilityMeasure`
`+ _root_.MeasureTheory.OuterMeasure.toMeasure_zero`
`+ comap_zero`
`+ eq_zero_or_isProbabilityMeasure`
`+ instance (priority := 100) (μ : Measure α) [IsProbabilityMeasure μ] :`
`+ instance (priority := 100) IsZeroOrProbabilityMeasure.toIsFiniteMeasure (μ : Measure α)`
`+ instance : IsZeroOrProbabilityMeasure (0 : Measure α)`
`+ instance : IsZeroOrProbabilityMeasure μ[|s] := by`
`+ instance {f : α → β} : IsZeroOrProbabilityMeasure (map f μ) := by`
`+ instance {s : Set Ω} : IsZeroOrProbabilityMeasure (condCount s) := by`
`+ isZeroOrProbabilityMeasureSMul`
`+ isZeroOrProbabilityMeasure_iff`
`- OuterMeasure.toMeasure_zero`
`- cond_isFiniteMeasure`
`- instance (priority := 100) IsProbabilityMeasure.toIsFiniteMeasure (μ : Measure α)`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10610183042/job/29407176388)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10610183042/job/29407176184)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: add a new class `IsZeroOrProbabilityMeasure`
